Job Title: Creative Marketing Intern

Location: San Francisco, CA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Marketing, Sales

Description:
Current Employees of LendingClub: Please apply via your internal Workday Account

LendingClub Corporation (NYSE: LC) is the parent company of LendingClub Bank, National Association, Member FDIC. We are the leading digital marketplace bank in the U.S., having helped our nearly 5 million members secure over $90 billion in loans to refinance high-cost debt and achieve their financial goals. Members today have mobile-first access to a growing range of products and services designed to work seamlessly together to deliver value in new ways. Everyone deserves a better financial future, and our team is committed to making that a reality. Join the Club!

About The Role

Join LendingClub’s 2024 Summer Internship, located in the heart of San Francisco, CA. If you’re a rising senior or recent graduate looking for an opportunity in Marketing, apply to our 10-week program. Starting in June and concluding in August, our Internship Program offers a rich environment for professional and personal growth.

As an Intern, you'll bring your passion, innovativeness and expertise to help make impossible happen and evolve with purpose. You’ll benefit from hands-on experience, lunch & learns, and shadowing sessions. Your manager, who will also be your mentor, will provide guidance throughout the program.



What You'll Do


You’ll be assigned a project to work on and complete during the internship You’ll collaborate with your team and work cross-functionally with other departments You’ll showcase your project during a presentation to LendingClub employees at the end of the 10-week program Develop and implement graphic designs following brand guidelines for a variety of uses including but not limited to promotional marketing, consumer products, and corporate branding Create illustrations and icons to expand our brand library Create new Marketing email templates and landing pages 


About You


Rising senior pursuing a bachelor’s or master’s degree in marketing, communications, design, or related field. Recent graduates are welcome as well! Eagerness to learn and contribute Self-motivated and excel in a fast-paced environment Strong interest in Fintech and LendingClub Passionate about changing the banking industry Excellent written, verbal and communication skills Passionate about customer problems and learning new technologies learning how design solutions can impact a business Ability to think analytically and strategically, have a can-do attitude, are not afraid to ask questions, and can think outside the box Working knowledge of Figma and Adobe Creative Suite (Illustrator, InDesign, Photoshop) Experience and desire to work in both print and web Portfolio showing work samples 

Compensation

The pay rate for this position is $32 hourly.

LendingClub is an equal opportunity employer and dedicated to diversity, equity, and inclusion in the workplace. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, sex (including pregnancy, childbirth, reproductive health decisions, or related medical conditions), gender, gender identity, gender expression, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, disability status, political views or activity, or other applicable legally protected characteristics. We believe that a variety of perspectives will make our teams and business stronger as we work together to transform the traditional banking system.

We are committed to providing reasonable accommodations for qualified individuals with disabilities in our job application process. If you need assistance or an accommodation due to a disability, please contact us at interviewaccommodations@lendingclub.com.

Experience Level (if available): Internship
